Side Projects

Money Bags

A mini web app used to track a monthly budget and yearly savings based on income and expenses provided by the user. I'm still tinkering with this project, so it is very much a work in progress.

Technologies Used:

  • Foundation 4 (SASS)
  • Angular JS
  • Grunt JS
  • Node JS
Hand crafted by Demetri Ganoff.

Check out the source code for this site:
https://github.com/dganoff/personal-site
